website_summaries.verdict: If you like the idea of a wireless model, this is a solid option.
pros: Features a convenient design that can be used wirelessly
cons: The loud alarm is great for deep sleepers but might frighten some children

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend Happy Mom confident Son.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing was working for my son. We tried reducing liquid, prescription medication waking him up in the middle of night nothing worked. This device was a god send. It took about a month for my son who is hardest sleeper I ever met for it to work. Then it was light a switch in his brain turned on and suddenly we went a month no accidents. He was going to sleepovers having sleepovers and no longer needed the device. I think it’s been 3 months now accidents. We went from washing sheets and blankets everyday to dry for 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Dazzled by Twlight

customer_reviews.title: Seriously this is a great product! We had no glitches
customer_reviews.text: Seriously this is a great product! We had no glitches, no issues, and my son stopped wetting his bed. I feel like it trained his brain to be aware that he was wetting and stopped him before he fully emptied. My son was 5.5 when we used it and it took about 3 weeks of gradual progress to really get results. I would totally buy this again and will be using it soon on my daughter as well!
customer_reviews.author: Katerina's got her smile :)

customer_reviews.title: Good for Some Not for Others
customer_reviews.text: It ONLY works if it wakes the “person” up. Otherwise it only wakes everyone else up, And everyone else knows & you still have to take care of the mess. For our use... 2 Stars For what might help others I’ll give 4
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Smith

customer_reviews.title: The best tool ever!
customer_reviews.text: I can't shout from the rooftops loud enough about how wonderful this product is. I was at a loss about what to do for my daughter (4 1/2) since she had no interest in using the bathroom at night. This was a last resort and a game changer. I seriously wish I would have gotten one sooner. Finally free from night time diapers and changing sheets every night!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Centanino

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 9 and was constantly wetting the bed still. We tried everything (waking him up, no liquids after a certain time, etc). We were buying pull-ups and a bed mats for him. Within 2 weeks he was completely dry and in the first month, he only wet twice. It did not wake up anyone else in the house, just him. I am SO HAPPY to finally not buy all the other products anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Winger

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old was still wearing a pullup at night and waking up wet most mornings. Our pediatrician said he recommends a bedwetting alarm at 6 but seemed unconcerned about our 5 year old's bedwetting. We didn't want to wait another year, so we did our own research and found this alarm. After 6 weeks of use my son is no longer wetting the bed! He has gone the past 2 weeks completely accident free!! What we spent on the alarm was a fraction of the price of pullups for another year. Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you to Randy and customer service for quick response and supplying us with another sensor. The DryBuddy Flex 3 wakes my son at night and is easy to use for him as well. Thank you again for going the extra mile and shipping it so quickly and free of charge to a hotel I was staying at. Very satisfied so far with the product and service. Keep up the great work!
customer_reviews.author: Mr.MAREK

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son is an extremely deep sleeper. He sleep walks and everything..... he peed in his pullup every single night. And a LOT. I purchased this product on December 14 and by February 27 he started waking up dry every single night. It's now been 3 weeks of him being DRY. No pull ups, no wet sheets and one very happy child (and mama). HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: False alarms consistently
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to help nighttrain my daughter. It worked for three weeks. Then consistently went off about 10 minutes after placing it on underwear. Unable to use and was unable to return because return window was 3 weeks long. Don’t waste your $$.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and works well after about two and a half to three weeks. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Christy W

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Sensor never went off when my little one peed the bed. I have synchronized it, tried testing it with salt water (sporadic results, but I gave it a try anyway ), and now when I press the synchronize button the music changes. I would return if it wasn't just passed the return window. It's a really great idea, but I need to be able to trust it works without fail.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Rittmann

customer_reviews.title: Pretty useless — wakes everybody but him.
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. Reasonably reliable, but doesn’t usually go off until all the peeing has happened. Wakes the house. Everyone except the bed wetter. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: uberlink

customer_reviews.title: False alarm
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 4 nights and then started false alarming about 2 minutes after turning on.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use, and it works!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several bed wetting alarms and this is by far the best! Even for a deep sleeper. It’s easy to use and has worked great for us. Very pleased with the product, and great customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. However, my son slept through the alarm. Which I'm still trying to figure out because it is loud!! My son is a hard sleeper! Good product but it wasn't for my child!
customer_reviews.author: LeahMae Wells

customer_reviews.title: My son is happy and feels more confident.
customer_reviews.text: This product had been a blessing for my 8 year old son. He had been using the drybuddy flex 3 for about 3 weeks. He is so excited that it works. His smile makes this product worth every dime we paid. TX mamabear02
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t buy again! Doesn’t always alarm. The piece that gets fastened in the underwear moves around so it won’t always alarm, would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Sander

customer_reviews.title: This did not help my son
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended to get this product by my child's doctor. Not only did I not hear the alarm go off, but my child did not either.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rutt

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t work. In 5 days, the alarm only went off (and my son wet the bed every night). We’re back to pull ups and he’s feeling worse about himself than before we tied this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: It does exactly what it says it does and alerts me while senior is in other room
customer_reviews.text: I’m taking care of a senior and works great. It Alerts me while it is still a diaper or throw away pad issue before it becomes an entire wet bed covers issue!
customer_reviews.author: Windozer50

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my child
customer_reviews.text: My child has used this for over a month and the sensor has yet to detect and sound an alarm when wetness occurs at night. We have tried to position it in different places on the underwear but still nothing. The areas where the sensor was placed were soaked but no alarm sounded. I liked that it was wireless but other than that this product has not worked.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was sold a refurbished product as new. Item was re-taped and the sensor had visible scratches on it...
customer_reviews.author: Greg Williams

customer_reviews.title: It worked!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We used this and a little over 2 weeks the enurisis stopped! Wish my parents knew about this when I was a child!!! My son is so happy to not wet anymore! He is a hard sleeper and it still worked. I work for a sleep doctor and I was so impressed I let him know!! Thank God for a solution... only thing I regret is not doing it sooner. My son just turned 8.
customer_reviews.author: Christina SG

customer_reviews.title: Works great wish we’d bought tried it a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED TO ADD: my 9 yo is finally doing it!! Only 2 wet nights in the last 21 days!!! I cannot begin to express how LIFE CHANGING this product has been for our family!! Thank you so much!!!!! Nice loud alarm and extremely responsive works just exactly as advertised. I highly recommend ordering the Dry buddy briefs as well as they make it even easier to use. It’s been a couple weeks and my son is starting to see some success. The customer service has been incredibly helpful and highly responsive to all of my questions and needs. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This dry buddy helped my 10 year old with bedwetting *and* my 3 year old with potty training. It has a big enough range that he can wear it around the house. After a few months, I thought the sensor had broken. I went to their website, and called the number for customer service. Despite Covid, Randy called me back within an hour, and patiently walked me through syncing it. I later discovered he could have just pointed me to the instructions on the website, but instead he took the time to make sure it was working. This is truly a great product, and I'll definitely be recommending it to my friends (once we can see each other again!)
customer_reviews.author: C Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Best alarm we’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: Only alarm that has worked so far! Loud enough for my deep sleeper, great quality, easy to use, comfortable to wear, no wires on body, only a few false alarms.
customer_reviews.author: Jodes

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This does not work. Don't waste your money. An alarm goes off when it gets wet. Not sure how I thought this would fix the problem except our dr recommended it. We have been using it for months and the problem is not at all better.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Walton

customer_reviews.title: It REALLY does work!
customer_reviews.text: One month of using this product is all it took.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOMER SERVICE AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Any one with issues or problems should contact Dry Buddy personally! Customer Service is AMAZING!!! I have had problems with mine a couple times and they have replaced the device when my son accidentally stepped on the cord and pulled the wires out! I have never dealt with such a great customer service as well as this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Wagner-knight 71

customer_reviews.title: First alarm that works!
customer_reviews.text: We have bought several less expensive systems prior to this that either would disconnect in the middle of the night or not wake my son up. We have been using this for a few nights and he has woken up quickly from the alarm with minimal wetness and woken up once on his own which he has never done. The item shipped quickly and the customer service is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: nvillemom

customer_reviews.title: Device works great; their customer service is top notch!
customer_reviews.text: We have used Dry Buddy through 3 children over the last 10 years, (all the way back to older models), and have always been happy with the ease of use, the effectiveness, and definitely with their customer service. They have always been so helpful with troubleshooting/set up, replacing parts and honoring warranties. Very personable and friendly! I would recommend this to everyone with every age of bedwetter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the system really works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but this really wakes a child up before the bed becomes a mess. It is a great tool for training a child to use the toilet at night. Made our lives easier!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lora Z

customer_reviews.title: ... choose DryBuddy based on its wireless design and the good reviews. I was not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I did lots of research before purchasing this item and choose DryBuddy based on its wireless design and the good reviews. I was not disappointed. The device worked like a charm. By the end of 3 weeks, my 9 year old son, who has had only a handful of dry nights in his entire life, was having completely dry nights. The nicest surprise was the customer service provided by the company. They were always responsive, informative, and supportive. It's kind of a shame that I will no longer need the product but I guess that's the point! It was easily the best $100 that I've ever spent. Thank you DryBuddy!
customer_reviews.author: L. Nguyen

product_meta.title: DryBuddyFLEX 3 Wireless Bedwetting Alarm System with Magnetic Sensor & Remote. New 3rd Gen. Long-Range True Wireless with Magnetic Sensor & Remote. Most Convenient, Feature-Rich & Effective.
feature_bullets: The DryBuddyFLEX 3 is the 3rd Generation of the acclaimed DryBuddyFLEX, with more conveniences and abilities than any other bedwetting alarm. Long-range (max 200 ft. / 61 meters) true wireless performance for the greatest convenience. A powerful, flexible alarm that is sure to get the user’s attention. Get the loudest sound/music and strongest vibrations (with the optional bed shaker) of any bedwetting alarm. Perfect for deep sleepers and sensitive children/patients. Excellent for special needs.

Freedom and safety from the burden and discomfort of wires and an alarm that has to be worn. Why use a “honker” with a cable and an alarm box attached to clothing or body, which is a nuisance to wear? Not wearing an alarm box is always very comfortable. Keep the alarm besides a pillow when sleeping, on a bedside table, or far away to force the user to get up. Use multiple DryBuddyFLEX 3 systems in the same house. Easy and simple daily operation with one button or the Remote.

The powerful loud alarm (adjustable volume from 97.2 dB at 8 inches (20 cms) down to zero) allows placing the alarm close by or at a considerable distance while still being effective. Easy monitoring with the remote control and remote alarms. The optional bed shaker (Amazon ASIN: B07SXD783Z) provides a stronger vibration than any other vibrator for a bed-wetting alarm. The DryBuddyFLEX 3 is resistant to being triggered by perspiration.

Comfort and convenience in wetness sensing and using the bedwetting alarm. The patented magnetic sensor is very easy to use and clean as it has all exposed surfaces. It effortlessly and firmly attaches to standard cotton briefs. It can also be used with the optional DryBuddy wetness sensing briefs which are extremely reliable and comfortable. The wireless Remote provides unmatched convenience for the user and the caregiver. FDA, FCC, CE, RoHS Registered and Certified for your peace-of-mind.

Use the DryBuddyFLEX 3 straight out of the box. Customize the DryBuddyFLEX as you use and learn. The DryBuddyFLEX is supported with a 1 year limited warranty (6 months for the briefs). Designed and made by DryBuddy, the world’s leader in wireless bedwetting alarm innovation and technology. For Help and Advice, contact DryBuddy through Amazon’s email or at 912-352-8854. Find extensive Q&A at www.DryBuddy.com. Help Amazon by keeping reviews honest, trustworthy and sensible. Thank you.
